details.Notification details: We are pleased to announce the examination date for the Uttar Pradesh Pollution Control Board. The examination will be conducted on 08-02-2025 and 13-02-2025.

name: Consultant (Building maintenance) Recruitment Drive at Uttar Pradesh Pollution Control Board

details.Description: Applications are invited for one post of Consultant (Building maintenance) at Uttar Pradesh Pollution Control Board. The selected candidate will be appointed on fixed pay, and the tenure will be six months from joining or till further order, whichever is less.
